name: LesleyD Training
description: LesleyD specialises in corporate training & teaching mindfulness practices to employees at large corporates. The colour psychology of blue symbolises calm, confidence & trust; whilst her broad range of services needed a logomark that represents them all.

name: Asante2gether
elements: Logo, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Company Profile
description:
Asante2gether assists local communities to generate income, to find their purpose, and to enable self-sufficiency. 

 We created a friendly and clean brand identity for Asante2gether that portrays their journey in assisting with skills-development to help people move from poverty to prosperity.

name: HundredFold
elements: Logo, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Company Profile, Custom Document Design
description:
Hundredfold is an African focus strategy company that prides itself in international networks and global collaborations. 

They were in need of a sleek & modern brand identity with a dark/moody feel.

name: Reset Capital
description:
Reset Capital (RC) is an investment firm based in Johannesburg with a unique focus on investment opportunities in BEE companies. 

The design elements include Logos, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Letterheads & Presentation Design.

name: Together Through Skills
elements: Logo, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Company Profile
description: Together Through Skills (TTS) is a recruitment, training and placement company, focusing on youth employment, entrepreneurship development, rural communities and people living with disabilities.

name: PR Engineering
elements: Logo, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Company Profile, Custom Document Design
description:
PR Engineering is a consulting engineering firm providing comprehensive and value-driven design and project management services. 
 They were in need of a Brand Identity reflecting that was modern & clean, and is reflective of their services in a subtle way throughout their brand.

name: Oosthuizens Attorneys
description: Oosthuizens Attorneys is a boutique law firm based south of Johannesburg. They needed a complete brand revitalization.

name: CCPT
elements: Logo, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Company Profile, Custom Document Design
description:
Cape Control Panel Technology (CCPT) is an engineering firm that builds specialised power and control panels. 
 They were a new startup and needed a fresh and modern brand.

name: NC Chemicals
elements: Logo, Business Cards, Email Signatures, Company Profile, Custom Document Design
description: NC Chemicals is a manufacturer and distributor of cleaning chemicals for the car wash and industrial industry.
